actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earning.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Increases, under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, to $3,000 the amount of outside earnings permitted each year without deductions from benefits thereunder.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $3,000 the annual amount which individuals may earn without suffering deductions from benefits on account of excess earning.
